SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.quest.glue.api.services
Interface WinRMInfoConnectionParameters

All Superinterfaces:
WindowsInfoConnectionParameters
public interface WinRMInfoConnectionParameters
extends WindowsInfoConnectionParameters

Connection parameters that are specific to WindowsRM connections. This includes the port and path to the service, though if these are not explicitly set then default values will be used.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getPath()
          Returns the servlet path to the WinRM service running on the target host.
 int getPort()
          Returns the port number that connections made using these parameters will use.
 boolean getUseHttps()
          Returns whether or not connections established with these parameters will connect using HTTPS.
 void setPath(java.lang.String path)
          Sets the servlet path to the WinRM service running on the target host.
 void setPort(int port)
          Sets the port that these connections will be made on.
 void setUseHttps(boolean useHttps)
          Controls whether or not connections will be attempted using HTTP (the default setting) or HTTPS.
 
Methods inherited from interface com.quest.glue.api.services.WindowsInfoConnectionParameters
getHostname, getNamespace, getTags, getTimeout, setHostname, setNamespace, setTags, setTimeout
 

Method Detail

getPath

java.lang.String getPath()
Returns the servlet path to the WinRM service running on the target host. The default value is /wsman. This method will never return null.

Returns:
The path to the WinRM servlet on the target host

getPort

int getPort()
Returns the port number that connections made using these parameters will use. The default value is 5985 although Microsoft originally set it to port 80. This implementation defaults to 5985.

Returns:
The port that WinRM connections will be made on

getUseHttps

boolean getUseHttps()
Returns whether or not connections established with these parameters will connect using HTTPS. The default value is false, meaning connections will be established using only HTTP.

Returns:
True if this connection should use HTTPS, false otherwise.

setPath

void setPath(java.lang.String path)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Sets the servlet path to the WinRM service running on the target host. The default value is /wsman.

Parameters:
path - The new path used to access the WinRM service
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The provided path is null.

setPort

void setPort(int port)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Sets the port that these connections will be made on. The default value is 5985 although originally Microsoft had set it to port 80. This implementation defaults to 5985.

Parameters:
port - The new port to connect on
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The port number is less than or equal to zero

setUseHttps

void setUseHttps(boolean useHttps)
Controls whether or not connections will be attempted using HTTP (the default setting) or HTTPS.

Parameters:
useHttps - True if the connection should be established using HTTPS, false for HTTP
